name: skilltest-web-app
description: A platform to create skill tests for users.

scripts.build: npm run prebuild && tsc && terser src/views/test/attend.js -o src/public/js/attend.js -c -m && npm run copy-views && npm run copy-public
scripts.copy-views: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); function copyDir(src,dest){fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true}); const entries=fs.readdirSync(src,{withFileTypes:true}); for(let entry of entries){const srcPath=path.join(src,entry.name); const destPath=path.join(dest,entry.name); if(entry.isDirectory()){copyDir(srcPath,destPath);}else{fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath);}}} copyDir('src/views','dist/views');"
scripts.copy-public: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); function copyDir(src,dest){fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true}); const entries=fs.readdirSync(src,{withFileTypes:true}); for(let entry of entries){const srcPath=path.join(src,entry.name); const destPath=path.join(dest,entry.name); if(entry.isDirectory()){copyDir(srcPath,destPath);}else{fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath);}}} copyDir('src/public','dist/public');"
scripts.migration:run:build: npm run build:ts && npm run migration:run
